entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 2:40 PM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow late this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except 90 gusting to 110 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
